com.box.sdk

Class BoxZip

  • Object
    • BoxZip

  • public class BoxZip
extends Object
    Provides methods to allow users to download multiple files and folders as a single zip file. Users can download up to either 32GB or 10,000 files in one batch (whichever limitation is hit first) as a single zip file.

        public BoxZipInfo create(String name,
                         List<BoxZipItem> items)
        Creates a zip of multiple files and folders.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the zip file to be created
        items - list of files or folders to be part of the created zip
        Returns:
        information about the created zip file

                                     List<BoxZipItem> items,
                                     OutputStream output)
        Creates a zip and downloads it to a given OutputStream.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the zip file to be created
        items - list of files or folders to be part of the created zip
        output - the stream to where the zip file will be written.
        Returns:
        information about status of the download

      • download

        public BoxZipDownloadStatus download(String name,
                                     List<BoxZipItem> items,
                                     OutputStream output,
                                     ProgressListener listener)
        Creates a zip and downloads its contents its to a given OutputStream.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the zip file to be created
        items - list of files or folders to be part of the created zip
        output - the stream to where the zip file will be written.
        listener - a listener for monitoring the download's progress.
        Returns:
        information about status of the download
